diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $4$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line $AB$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $CD$.
line_instances: The lines $AB$ and $CD$ intersect at point $D$.
The lines $AC$ and $BD$ intersect at point $B$.
The lines $AD$ and $BC$ intersect at point $C$.
